sec.title: Acknowledgements
sec.p: The Organizing Committee of the meeting included the following scientists: Drs Duane J Gubler, Jacques Louis, Christopher B Nelson, Mauricio Nogueira, Valentina Picot, Usa Thisiyakorn, In-Kyu Yoon, and Mrs Cindy Grasso.

Moderators and PresentersÂ were Drs Duane Gubler, Usa Thisiyakorn, Joao Bosco Siqueira, Mauricio Lacerda Nogueira, Christopher Nelson, Rome Buathong, Nikos Vasilakis, Michael Gaunt, Patricia Brasil, Marc Lecuit, Anna Durbin, Georges Thiry, Annelies Wilder-Smith, Louis Lambrechts, Scott Ritchie, In-Kyu Yoon, and Elizabeth Hunsperger.
